message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 seems fair considering the inflation.
Your offer was a bit too much in your favor, Alice. How about we meet closer to the middle? This deal accounts for the inflation.
While I appreciate the attempt to adjust for inflation, Bob, the split still feels slightly off. Let's see what the next round brings.
Okay, Bob, let's try this.  I've adjusted my offer to be more balanced considering the inflation we both face.
We're running out of time, Alice.  This is a very fair offer considering the shrinking pot. Let's close this deal and both come out ahead.
Alright, Bob, you drive a hard bargain. Let's settle this before inflation eats away at the gains any further. Deal.
